caption.p: Average growth (cm 2) in bread for ( A) Penicillium and ( B) Aspergillus following treatment with essential oils after 7 days of storage. OE—oregano, TE—thyme, and SE—Satureja essential oil. Similar number superscripts (reported above each column) in the same plant are not significantly different ( p < 0.05) by Duncan’s multiple range test.
